DOC.brief_summary: This study multicenter , randomize study subject high cholesterol receive statin assess efficacy lower LDL-C , safety , tolerability actual use bococizumab autoinjector ( pre-filled pen ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability And Actual Use Study Of Bococizumab And An Autoinjector ( Pre-Filled Pen ) In Subjects With Hyperlipidemia Or Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Treated statin Fasting LDLC > =70mg/dL triglycerides < =400mg/dL Pregnant breastfeed female Cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure past 90 day Congestive heart failure NYHA class IV Poorly control hypertension
